newsitem.title: USA: Belding Heminway gets $42 mln loan facility.
newsitem.headline: Belding Heminway gets $42 mln loan facility.

text.p: Belding Heminway Co said it agreed to a new $42 million credit facility with Heller Financial Inc and Sanwa Business Credit Corp.

The facility, which contains restrictions on dividends and redemptions of common and preferred shares, consists of two five-year term loans totaling $22 million and a $20 million revolving credit loan.
The company said it will use the loan to pay off in full a another loan from NationsBank. Paying off the NationsBank loan will save the company $2.5 million in interest fees, Belding said.
Belding makes and markets sewing and crafts products.
